channel.title: Tag: nodejs - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Spying on Big Sonic Heaven
item.description: TL;DR: A little over a year ago, one of my favorite radio DJs, Darren Revell, started up a new streaming radio station named Big Sonic Heaven. I got the idea to try building a Spotify playlist collected from the music he plays. My quick & dirty program for doing that turned 1-year-old on April 24 and the playlist has collected over 2000 songs, so far.

item.title: Playing with a node.js app project layout
item.description: I'm pleased with this project layout for a node.js-based web client / server app.
